questions.question: $!$20\:mol$!$ of an ideal gas undergoes adiabatic expansion. Initially, the gas is at a temperature of $!$300\:K$!$ and finally, the temperature of the gas is $!$200\:K$!$. What is the total work done by the gas?

Consider a system consisting of $!$2$!$ different particles. Each of the $!$2$!$ particles can occupy one of two energy levels - normal and excited. Find all the possible macrostates of the system and determine which of them is the most probable?
questions.answer: One excited particle and one normal particle

questions.question: A system, consisting of $!$5$!$ particles, is initially in a state where only $!$1$!$ particle is in the excited state. The system is then brought into a state where $!$3$!$ particles are in the excited state. What is the change in entropy of the system?
